title: France panorama. [No. 71/39]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Thalassotherapy - the Thalassotherapy Institute of Quiberon. 2. The arts: The whys and wherefores of sketching - the Courneuve Drawing Exhibition. Icons in Aix - ancient and Byzantine icons at Aix-en-Provence. 3. High tension - the high-tension test laboratory of France. 4. Transatlantic Concord - the franco-British supersonic Concord spans the Atlantic.
